meanings.definition: To make changes to something in order to improve or update it.
meanings.sent1: She is remodifying her website to make it more user-friendly.
meanings.sent2: The company is remodifying their product to meet customer demands.
meanings.sent3: John kept remodifying his essay until it was perfect.
meanings.sent4: Her constant remodifying of the recipe resulted in a delicious dish.
meanings.sent5: The artist spent hours remodifying the painting to capture the right mood.

meanings.definition: The act of modifying something again.
meanings.sent1: The remodifying of the contract led to confusion among the team.
meanings.sent2: After the remodifying, the document was ready for submission.
meanings.sent3: The remodifying of the play added an unexpected twist to the plot.
meanings.sent4: His constant remodifying of the design showed his attention to detail.
meanings.sent5: The remodifying of the policy brought about positive changes in the organization.
